lines.p: From the depths I call to you, O Jehovah.

O Jehovah, hear my voice.
May your ears pay attention to my pleas for help.
If errors were what you watch, O Jah,Then who, O Jehovah, could stand?
For with you there is true forgiveness,So that you may be held in awe.
I hope in Jehovah, my whole being hopes in him;I wait for his word.
I eagerly wait for Jehovah,More than watchmen wait for the morning,Yes, more than watchmen wait for the morning.
Let Israel keep waiting for Jehovah,For Jehovah is loyal in his love,And he has great power to redeem.
He will redeem Israel from all their errors.
